objectiveSeeds.name: Recover the Lost Relic
objectiveSeeds.description: A powerful or significant artifact has been lost, stolen, or hidden. The party must locate and secure it.

stakes.on_success: The relic is secured and its influence contained.
stakes.on_failure: The relic empowers an enemy or destabilizes the region.

objectiveSeeds.name: Protect the Vulnerable
objectiveSeeds.description: A community or individual is under imminent threat.

stakes.on_success: Lives are saved and trust is earned.

objectiveSeeds.name: Expose the Hidden Truth
objectiveSeeds.description: A secret threatens to reshape power or belief if revealed.

stakes.on_success: The truth alters the balance of power.

objectiveSeeds.name: Escape the Encroaching Doom
objectiveSeeds.description: A growing danger must be fled or outrun before it closes in.

stakes.on_success: The party survives and retains agency.
stakes.on_failure: They are trapped, scattered, or consumed.

objectiveSeeds.name: Break the Siege
objectiveSeeds.description: A stronghold, district, or sanctuary is under sustained pressure; the party must end the siege or slip through it.

stakes.on_success: The besieged endure and the enemy loses momentum.
stakes.on_failure: The defense collapses and innocents pay the price.

objectiveSeeds.name: Stop the Convergence
objectiveSeeds.description: A rite, machine, or phenomenon nears completion; the party must interrupt it before it reshapes reality.

stakes.on_success: The threat is delayed or neutralized.
stakes.on_failure: The world changes in a lasting way.

objectiveSeeds.name: Escort the Key
objectiveSeeds.description: A person, object, or message must reach a destination intact despite pursuit and sabotage.

stakes.on_success: The key arrives and unlocks a decisive advantage.
stakes.on_failure: The key is captured or destroyed, shifting the balance.

objectiveSeeds.name: Secure the Treaty
objectiveSeeds.description: A fragile alliance or agreement must be forged under pressure, deceit, and competing interests.

stakes.on_success: Peace, access, or unity is achieved.

objectiveSeeds.name: Cleanse the Blight
objectiveSeeds.description: A spreading corruption poisons land, minds, or institutions; the party must find and sever its source.

stakes.on_success: The blight recedes and survivors recover.
stakes.on_failure: The corruption becomes permanent and expands.

objectiveSeeds.name: Steal the Blueprint
objectiveSeeds.description: A plan, ledger, or design will enable catastrophe if completed; the party must steal or destroy it.

twistCandidates.name: The Villain Is a Decoy
twistCandidates.description: The apparent antagonist is not the true source of the threat.

twistCandidates.name: Time Is Running Out
twistCandidates.description: Events progress toward disaster if the party delays.

twistCandidates.name: An Ally Turns
twistCandidates.description: A trusted figure reveals conflicting loyalties at a critical moment.

twistCandidates.name: Success Has a Cost
twistCandidates.description: Achieving the goal triggers an unforeseen consequence that must be faced.

twistCandidates.name: The Enemy Is Not What They Seem
twistCandidates.description: The antagonist’s motives complicate the moral landscape and solutions.

twistCandidates.name: The Key Is Someone
twistCandidates.description: The critical ‘object’ is a living person or sentient being with agency and demands.

twistCandidates.name: Another Party Wants the Same Prize
twistCandidates.description: Rivals pursue the same objective, forcing tradeoffs, bargains, or conflict.

twistCandidates.name: The Ground Refuses to Stay Still
twistCandidates.description: Routes, rooms, or landmarks rearrange; navigation and assumptions fail.

twistCandidates.name: Your Patron Is Complicit
twistCandidates.description: The one who sent the party benefits from the threat—or helped cause it.

twistCandidates.name: Mercy Returns With Teeth
twistCandidates.description: A spared foe, freed captive, or forgiven rival returns with consequences.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Void Behemoth
antagonistCandidates.goal: Feed on instability within the Weave.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Crownless Regent
antagonistCandidates.goal: Seize authority through fear or manipulation.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Iron Bailiffs
antagonistCandidates.goal: Collect debts and expand control under 'lawful' pretense.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Blistering Fog
antagonistCandidates.goal: Spread, suffocate, and erase paths and memory.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Glass Oracle
antagonistCandidates.goal: Manipulate outcomes to force a foretold future.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Hollow Host
antagonistCandidates.goal: Assimilate communities into a single will.

antagonistCandidates.name: Rift Poachers
antagonistCandidates.goal: Harvest unstable sites and sell what should remain buried.

antagonistCandidates.name: The Last Warden
antagonistCandidates.goal: Prevent anyone from touching a sealed truth—at any cost.

setPieceCandidates.failureConsequence: deal turns into a trap or chase

setPieceCandidates.name: The Forced Split
setPieceCandidates.failureConsequence: one group is cornered or misled

setPieceCandidates.name: The Trial of Names
setPieceCandidates.failureConsequence: a secret is exposed or access is denied

optionalConstraints.description: Combat should be rare and dangerous.
Actions have visible social and political repercussions.
Healing, rest, and supplies are scarce.
Final death reversal may be possible at great cost.
Preferred solutions emphasize restraint and non-lethal outcomes when possible.
Information is fragmented; investigation and inference are central.
The campaign is anchored in one primary location with deep exploration.
The environment itself is a persistent threat.
NPCs and factions conceal motives; trust is a resource.
